content:
The second line of defense, including anti -tank ditches, anti -tank barriers and strongholds, is underway in the Kherson region.

About thisreportedHead of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin.

“It is part of the state program that is conducted in all frontier areas. We do our best to protect the liberated territories from the Russian Horde invasion, ”said Alexander Proudin.

He also denied Russian misinformation that Kherson is allegedly state and law enforcement agencies.

“It's a frank lie. All in their places. We work for our victory, ”he said.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the defensive borders in the Zaporozhye regionConstruction continuesfortifications.

cabinet of Ministers of Ukraineallocated UAH 20 billionfor fortification and construction of defense borders from the reserve fund of the state budget.
title: Anti -tank ditches and strongholds: in Kherson region they equip the second line of defense
